name: SpaceXplorer (619SECTION, Gerbil, LostHuman, YuiAzu)
description:
Game created during the 2020/2021 Winter DevSquad Academy Game-Jam

Use your mouse (left click) to fly your very bright "ball of light spaceship" across the Solar System. Your objective is to travel between planets to complete tasks and earn gold.
You can only travel to the planets next to the one you're currently on, and longer distances will consume more energy, so you have to plan carefully when to launch your ship.

Goal is to get enough (5000g) gold so you can upgrade your ship and travel outside solar system.

Listen to the OST on Souncloud

Credits:
Programming: YuiAzu, LostHuman, Gerbil
Art & Modelling: Gerbil
Audio: 619SECTION
